thread.title: 12 Super Interesting Facts You’ll Wanna Read If You Fucking Love Cheetos
thread.title_full: 12 Super Interesting Facts You’ll Wanna Read If You Fucking Love Cheetos

author: Farrah Penn
title: 12 Super Interesting Facts You’ll Wanna Read If You Fucking Love Cheetos
text:
View this image ›
Creative Commons / Flickr: mrbd ID: 10380905 2. A janitor at the Frito-Lay factory, Richard Montañez, was the first person to invent the incredibly successful Flamin’ Hot Cheeto after he began adding chili powder to his own Cheetos. WKNO / youtube.com
Frito-Lay
 ID: 10381110 3. Despite what you might have thought, the neon orange cheese seasoning does indeed contain cheddar cheese . View this image ›
Creative Commons / Flickr: jeepersmedia ID: 10380940 4. Cheetos get their signature shape when the cornmeal passes through a boiling point. View this image ›
Creative Commons / Flickr: armydre2008 ID: 10380921 5. The limited edition cinnamon sugar Cheetos (called Sweetos) were the first non-savory Cheetos snack. View this image ›
Creative Commons / Flickr: jeepersmedia ID: 10380944 6. Pepsi-flavored and Mountain Dew-flavored Cheetos exist — but only in Japan. instagram.com
instagram.com
 ID: 10381190 7. Japan ALSO has strawberry and chocolate Cheetos. View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10380947 8. However, many different restaurants in the U.S. feed into the Cheetos obsession by offering food hybrids, like this Cheetos pizza and these Cheetos sushi burritos . Pablo Valdivia / BuzzFeed
instagram.com
 ID: 10381263 9. Up until 1998, “Cheetos” was hyphenated as “Chee-tos.” View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10381041 10. Cheetos first mascot wasn’t Chester the Cheetah you’ll still recognize today, but a Cheetos Mouse . View this image ›
youtube.com ID: 10380926 11. A Cheetos bronzer really, truly does exist for those who are absolutely obsessed. No, sadly it doesn’t taste or smell like the product. View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10381353 12. And finally, the texture of Cheetos is engineered to be addictive . Because it melts away in your mouth quickly, your brain is tricked into thinking there aren’t any calories. View this image ›
instagram.com Your obsession is REAL, and this is WHY.
ID: 10380963
